alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 2:30PM EDT until June 17 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dickenson County in southwestern Virginia... Buchanan County in southwestern Virginia... McDowell County in southern West Virginia... Southeastern Mingo County in southern West Virginia... Central Raleigh County in southeastern West Virginia... Southeastern Logan County in southern West Virginia... Wyoming County in southern West Virginia... Southeastern Boone County in central West Virginia... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 230 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Jenkins to near Bald Knob, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Welch, Clintwood, Grundy, Pineville, Haysi, John Flannagan Lake, Breaks Interstate, Davenport, Mullens, Oceana, Sophia, Gary, War, Northfork, Gilbert Creek, Coal City, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Trammel and Twin Falls State Park. This includes West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 28 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
